cleaned_text: and effective at increasing your protection against serious illness and hospitalisation from COVID-19 infection. ATAGI recommends that everyone aged 5 years and older gets a COVID-19 vaccine to help protect against COVID-19. Children aged 6 months to under 5 years who are at greater risk of severe disease are also eligible for COVID-19 vaccination. To be considered [up to date with COVID-19 vaccination](https://www.health.gov.au/our-work/covid-19-vaccines/getting-your-vaccination/stay-up-to-date), you must have had all the doses recommended for your age and health needs. [Boosters](https://www.health.gov.au/our-work/covid-19-vaccines/getting-your-vaccination/booster-doses) are particularly important to maintain your protection. COVID-19 vaccinations are available at participating GPs and pharmacies across South Australia.
